Articles.Content:
As stock as freshly redownloaded game can be.

[At around 7-8km Rapiers switch to rocket mode, because apparently there not enough intake air to support one of the engines](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/687146362859778451/E79ABE37FDEFFEC85A38AEF654B33EC5FAC70A07/). Before 1.0(.4?) this bug happened in upper atmosphere and was less annoying than this
